sentences.sContent: Health is a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Health is a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.
sentences.sCn: 健康是身体的、心理的及社会的达到完全安适状态，而不仅是没有疾病或身体虚弱而已。

sentences.sContent: Workers lose productivity by interrupting a business meeting and disrupt social gatherings because of their infirmity, the report said.
sentences.sContent_eng: Workers lose productivity by interrupting a business meeting and disrupt social gatherings because of their infirmity, the report said.
sentences.sCn: 报告中说，因为工人们的虚弱，通过中断了业务会议而失去生产效率，并且破坏了社交聚会的范围。

remMethod.val: in(不) + firm(坚定) + ity → 不坚强 → 虚弱， 衰弱

words.tran: 衰弱的；意志薄弱的；不坚固的

trans.tranOther: bad health or a particular illness
